headline: Is It Too Late To Consider S&P Global (SPGI) After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether S&P Global's share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article walks through what that might look like using several valuation tools. The stock last closed at US$541.94, with returns of 5.7% over the past week, 10.3% over the last month, 5.7% year to date, 13.1% over one year, 51.6% over three years and 84.7% over five years, which naturally raises questions about how much value is already reflected in the price. Recent coverage...

headline: S&P Global Schedules Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Earnings Announcement and Conference Call for Tuesday, February 10, 2026
summary: S&P Global's (NYSE: SPGI) fourth quarter and full-year 2025 results will be issued on Tuesday, February 10, 2026 via news release at approximately 7:15 a.m. Eastern Time. The news release will be available at www.spglobal.com.

headline: Entergy and NiSource Could Be Winners as Utilities Spend $1 Trillion on AI. Dividend Investors Not So Much
summary: Utilities are plowing growing profits into new power plants, and their soaring share prices mean that dividend yields are dropping.

raw.headline: Entergy and NiSource Could Be Winners as Utilities Spend $1 Trillion on AI. Dividend Investors Not So Much
raw.summary: Utilities are plowing growing profits into new power plants, and their soaring share prices mean that dividend yields are dropping.

headline: 2 Safe-and-Steady Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Ignore
summary: A stock with low volatility can be reassuring, but it doesn’t always mean strong long-term performance. Investors who prioritize stability may miss out on higher-reward opportunities elsewhere.

raw.headline: 2 Safe-and-Steady Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Ignore
